## Scrollbar.setVisible() method

Set whether the scrollbar is visible. Only applies to non-paired scrollbars.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setVisible(visible: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  visible | boolean | True if visible. |

**Returns:**

void
